logica_jogo

Class Eagle

  • java.lang.Object
    • logica_jogo.Element
      • logica_jogo.Character
        • logica_jogo.Eagle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Eagle
extends Character
    A class that implements the functionalities of required of an Eagle object.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Eagle

        public Eagle()
        Eagle constructor that places eagle at position (-1,-1). Eagle starts as a vanished element.

    • Method Detail

      • StartEagle

        public void StartEagle(Element h,
              Element s)
        A method that initiates the Eagle usage, unvanishing it and placing it at the first position in her way from "h" to "s". This method should be called before moveEagle.
        Parameters:
        h - An element the Eagle should use as the starting point.
        s - An element the Eagle should use as the ending point

      • newEaglePos

        public Coordinate newEaglePos()
        A function that returns a Coordinate object containing the next position the Eagle will go to. This function is based on the Bresenham algorithm, therefore no floating point arithmetic is used.
        Returns:
        A Coordinate object representing the position the eagle is supposed to go to.

      • reachedSword

        public void reachedSword()
        A function that should be called when the eagle has reached the sword. This method inverts the starting and ending position and changes the value of hasSword data member.

      • isFlying

        public boolean isFlying()

      • hasSword

        public boolean hasSword()
